description.narrative:
Lifeline Embattled Civil Society Organisations Assistance Fund is used to protect and support the fundamental freedoms of assembly and association (FOAA). Providing assistance to real people in real time, this multilateral fund embodies the donors’ shared commitments to those freedoms Lifeline provides small, targeted, short-term emergency grants for medical expenses, legal representation, prison visits, trial monitoring, temporary relocation, security, equipment replacement, and other types of urgently needed expenses to help address immediate needs. In addition, Lifeline makes support available to CSOs for short-term advocacy initiatives that aim to raise domestic and international awareness of a specific threat or restriction on civil society.
